Tutorial.Content:
Hey, and thanks for checking ot this project. This is a docs-system,
which is basically based on a JSON-response that might come from your server.

Guide.Content:
This system features a dynamic sidebar, based on your JSON-response, and it uses markdown.
What does this mean for you?
You can add anything you want, as long as it works in HTML.

Placeholder1.Content: After this section, there will be nothing of meaning, just placeholders to demonstrate the system. Thanks for checking out this project!
